page.title: 04THE SCHOOL
page.content: {The School The School is a prefabricated building erected in 1969. The main building has eight classrooms, various offices, staff room, kitchen (where food is prepared rather than simply served) and a hall which is both for P.E. and dining. It caters for chilren of just under five years old until they are eleven i.e. Primary School. There are 280 children and a teaching staff of nine plus the headmaster, a full time caretaker and various other staff. The sports facilities comprise a rugby pitch, a football pitch, three netball courts & an outdoor heated swimming pool. The curriculum is broad based with the emphasis as much on what is taught as what is learned. Extra curricular interests e.g. gymnastics, recorder playing and singing are taught in clubs. There is a P.T.A.
